Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • tracer.Point
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Tracer

    public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    A point in 2D space.
    Author:
    James Morrow

      • zip

        public static Point[] zip(float[] xs,
                          float[] ys)
        Takes two float arrays, xs and ys, to make a Point array, pts, such that pts[i] == new Point(xs[i], ys[i]), as i varies from 0 to min(xs.length, ys.length)-1

        ys - The array of y-values
